Name: Simon Hodgson
Job/Team Function: The executive head of Forestry Commission England. Reports to Defra Ministers and is responsible for providing strategic leadership and for overseeing all aspects of the department's operations in England.

Name: Wilma Harper
Job/Team Function: Manage the Corporate & Forestry Support Division in delivering the GB functions of the FC - forest sustainability standards; forests and climate change; biosecurity; authoritative information and evidence; governance. Deliver FCs corporate support functions: Inventory, Forecasting and Operational Support; Communications; Business Sustainability. Secretary to the Board of Forestry Commissioners.

Name: James Pendlebury
Job/Team Function: The Chief Executive of Forest Research, the Executive Agency which undertakes scientific research into all aspects of forestry.

Name: Peter Freer-Smith
Job/Team Function: The FC's Chief Scientist, responsible for directing all scientific research undertaken by the Agency.

Name: Frank MacCulloch
Job/Team Function: Manage the technical shared services (mechanical engineering and plant/seed supply) supporting managers across the FC and its Agencies.

Name: Brian Mahony
Job/Team Function: The Chief Executive of Forest Enterprise England, the Executive Agency which manages the public forest estate in England.

Name: Paul Snaith
Job/Team Function: Act as the Forestry Commissions Finance Director in support of the Director General as Principal Accounting Officer. Manage the Finance & Accounting shared service, supporting managers across the FC and its Agencies. Lead on preparation and implementation of efficiency plans. Act as SIRO for the FC.

Name: Jean Lindsay
Job/Team Function: Manage the Human Resources shared service, supporting managers across the FC and its Agencies. Lead on preparation and implementation of the FC's People Strategy.

Name: Laura Jones
Job Title: Head of Policy & Programmes, FC England
Job/Team Function: Lead on the preparation of policy and strategic programmes in FC England.

Name: Tim Rollinson
Job/Team Function: The executive head of the Forestry Commission. Responsible for providing strategic leadership and for overseeing all aspects of the department's operations.

Name: David Felstead
Job/Team Function: Manage the Information Services shared service, supporting managers across the FC and its Agencies.
